ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The drum is nice, but the speed increase isn t really that big.  It adds 20% to other percussion effects (e.g. Elemental Rhythms which used to give you +30
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 12 Oct 1999, Lange, Stephen wrote:
>
> But lo and behold she said she would trade! We met in the W. Commonland
> Druid ring and traded. I equipped it, and ZOOOOM!!!!! Off I went, wow, I am
> still amazed at the speed. At 13 I can outrun people in JBOOTS, and have
> outrun people with SOW. Its absolutely amazing how much ground I can get.

The drum is nice, but the speed increase isn't really that
big. It adds 20% to other percussion effects (e.g. Elemental
Rhythms which used to give you +30 to resists now gives you
+36). But for speed it is only about 15% greater speedup than
a normal hand drum when running unencumbered (for a total of
an extra 7%-8% compared to running at normal speed). If
you're walking (wounded) or encumbered, then the speedup is
more pronounced.

It sure *feels* a lot faster though. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
